description: Schema that defines the customer ECN message in Json format

interchangeID.description:
Unique ID for interchange. Will be calculated on file creation. To detect multiple receiving of the same message and to identify the interchange. 
CIM: none
READ:  - receiving system
WRITE:  - on file creation
AMEND:  - not allowed

senderIdentification.description:
use here the 4 digit code of the sending system. This may be a code according to UIC leaflet 920-1 of the file creating railway (like 2185). Also the code of the central system can be entered here, if it is the creator of the file.
READ:  - receiving system
WRITE:  - sending system on file creation
AMEND:  - not allowed

receiverIdentification.description:
use here the 4 digit code of the receiving system. This may be a code according to UIC leaflet 920-1 of the railway, which should receive the file (like 2185). Also the code of the central system can be entered here, if it is the destination of the file.
READ:  - receiving system
WRITE:  - sending system on file creation
AMEND:  - not allowed

msgPreparationDatetime.description:
Date and Time of preparation of the file.
READ:  - receiving system
WRITE:  - sending system on file creation
AMEND:  - not allowed

xsdVersion.description:
Used version of xsd. This has to be a valid value (i.e. '1.0') to secure the correct handling of the message by the recipient/central system.
CIM:  - none
READ:  - receiving system
WRITE:  - sending system
AMEND:  - not allowed

testIndicator.description:
Test Indicator (sent only for testing purposes). This flag is used to indicate test messages, which should be processed by special agreements due to testing purposes.
CIM: none
READ:  - receiving system
WRITE:  - sending system
AMEND:  - not allowed

sendingCarrier.description:
Use here the 4 digit code according to UIC leaflet 920-1 of the railway, which created/amended the message (like 2185).
READ:  ---
WRITE:  ---
AMEND:  - contractual carrier - successive carrier - central system

receivingCarrier.description:
Use here the 4 digit code according to UIC leaflet 920-1 of the railway, which is the receipient of the message (like 2185).If omitted the central system applies the receiving carrier code for all outgoing messages, using the carriers' chain provided by the group "ECNs/ECN/Carriers".
READ:  ---
WRITE:  ---
AMEND:  - contractual carrier - successive carrier - central system

messageReferenceNumber.description: Message Reference NumberThis identification is being generated during creation of the message. This allows the tracing of the message.

shipmentType.description:
Classification of the ECN as 'CUV' or 'CIM'.
CIM: 30
READ:  - consignee
WRITE:  - consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor.)

messageType.description:
Type of the message. This message structure is being used for several purposes. I.e. it is used as electronic consignment note (ECN) and also as informal message in case, the ECN has been printed (PCN). Further descriptions of the possible values can be found by the enumeration values.
CIM: none

madeAvailable.description:
Time (month, day, hour) that the consignment is made available to the consignee.
CIM: 60
READ:  - Shipper - Consignee
WRITE: --- ---
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Data provided by the destination carrier.)

ecnPreparationDatetime.description:
Date and Time of preparation of the ECN.
CIM: none
READ:  - contractual carrier - successive carrier - central system - Consignor  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - not allowed - not allowed

dossierNumber.description:
Internal identification number of the RU, which created the ECN. This information is important to be able to identify the ECN even after modifications. Format: RRRRYYYYMMDDNNNNNNN Where RRRR = railway code, YYYY = year, MM = month, DD = day and NNNNNNN = running number.
CIM: none
READ:  - contractual carrier - successive carrier - central system 
WRITE:  - shipping carrier
AMEND:  - not allowed - not allowed

ecnVersionNumber.description:
Message version number. This number hast to be incremented after each modification. On creation this value has to be set to 0.
CIM: none
READ:  - contractual carrier - successive carrier - central system 
WRITE:  ---
AMEND:  - contractual carrier - successive carrier - central system

printForm.description:
Which form to use for printout. CIM-CN or CIM-CN for combined traffic. This information assures, that the same paper document will be used for the 'duplicate of the consignment note' and the final print out of the ECN for the consignee.
RULE: IF (Omitted) THEN default value = 'WLT'
CIM: none
READ:  - contractual carrier - successive carrier - central system 
WRITE:  - contractual carrier - shipping carrier
AMEND:  - not allowed - not allowed

requestAOD.description: Check this element only, if the contractual carrier wants to receive an 'advice of delivery' from the destination carrier.

refusalReason.description:
Reason of declining of an ECN during hand-over. Element only allowed when MessageType = NACK.
RULE: IF (MessageType == 'NACK') THEN allowed ELSE not permitted
CIM: none

refusalCode.description:
CODE: code list has to be created. Use code 99 as default value.
CIM: none

refusalDescription.description:
Additional information concerning the refusal.
CIM: none

acceptancePoint.description: Information about the shipping station of the transport.

acceptanceDate.description:
Date and time (month, day and hour) at which the goods were accepted. 
CIM: 16
READ:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - not allowed

carrierCode.description:
Code of the shipping carrier.
CIM: 62
READ:  - Consignor - Consignee
WRITE:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Data providedby theforwarding carrier) 
AMEND:  - not allowed - not allowed

consignmentNumber.description:
Running number and check digit of the consignment. Format: NNNNNC The number consists of NNNNN = running number C = check digit
CIM: 62
READ:  - Consignor - Consignee
WRITE:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Data providedby theforwarding carrier) 
AMEND:  - not allowed - not allowed

forwardingTrainNumber.description:
Train number at shipping 
CIM: 40
READ:  - Consignor - Consignee
WRITE: ---
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Coding by theforwarding carrier.)

customers.description: Information about the consignor, consignee and freight payers.

items.description: Customer information. At least consignor and consignee must be given.

customerCode.description:
CODE: Customer Code (according to UIC leflet 920-10)
CIM: 2 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 3 Customer.Type = 'FPCR'
CIM: 5 Customer.Type = 'CE'
CIM: 6 Customer.Type = 'FPCE'
RULE: IF (customer.type == 'CR') THEN Mandatory ELSE Optional
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE: ---IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Carrier ELSE - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR' OR Customer.Type == 'FPCR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Addition of code. Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor). ELSE IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Addition of code. Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE IF (Customer.Type == 'FPCE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Addition of code. Amendment only in case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

name.description:
Customer Name (Partner Name)
CIM: 1 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 4 Customer.Type = 'CE'
RULE: IF (customer.type == 'CR' or customer.type == 'CE) THEN Mandatory ELSE Optional
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)ELSE none

additionalInformation.description:
Additional information supplied by the customer
CIM: 1 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 4 Customer.Type = 'CE'
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

VAT.description:
VAT identification Nr of customer
CIM: 1 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 4 Customer.Type = 'CE'
CODE: National codification
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

POBox.description:
P.O. Box
CIM: 1 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 4 Customer.Type = 'CE'
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

streetNumber.description:
House number
CIM: 1 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 4 Customer.Type = 'CE'
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

street.description:
Street
CIM: 1 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 4 Customer.Type = 'CE'
RULE: IF (customer.type == 'CR' or customer.type == 'CE) THEN Mandatory ELSE Optional
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

country.description:
Country Code (ISO Code)
CIM: 1 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 4 Customer.Type = 'CE'
RULE: IF (customer.type == 'CR' or customer.type == 'CE) THEN Mandatory ELSE Optional
CODE: ISO-3166-2
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

ZIPCode.description:
Postal Code
CIM: 1 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 4 Customer.Type = 'CE'
RULE: IF (customer.type == 'CR' or customer.type == 'CE) THEN Mandatory ELSE Optional
CODE: National codification
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

city.description:
City/Town
CIM: 1 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 4 Customer.Type = 'CE'
RULE: IF (customer.type == 'CR' or customer.type == 'CE) THEN Mandatory ELSE Optional
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

signature.description:
Signature
CIM: 1 Customer.Type = 'CR'
CIM: 4 Customer.Type = 'CE'
RULE: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') AND (ECNHeader.MessageType == 'ECN') THEN Mandatory
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

contactInformation.description:
Contact information
RULE: Transmission of empty tag is prohibited.

phoneNumber.description:
Telephone number
CIM: 1
CIM: 4
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

faxNumber.description:
Fax number
CIM: 1
CIM: 4
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

email.description:
Email address
CIM: 1
CIM: 4
READ: IF (Customer.Type == 'CR') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier - Consignee ELSE - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (Customer.Type == 'CE') THEN - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

code.description:
Consignor's declarations committing the carrier. If codes 1, 2, 6, 7 and 8 are used, enter the code and its meaning.
CIM: 7
RULE: IF (MsgHeader.MessageType == 'CUV') THEN Valid codes: 5, 9, 10, 11, 16, 18 ELSE Valid codes: 1-16
CODE: CIM proposition
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

text.description:
Declarartion Text (only for variable part of text)
CIM: 7
RULE: IF (ConsignorDeclaration.Code == [1, 2, 6, 7, 8]) THEN Optional ELSE Mandatory
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

additionalInformation.description:
Additional Infos
RULE: Transmission of empty tag is prohibited.

consignorReference.description:
Consignor's reference
CIM: 8
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders or on theinstruction of the consignor.)

informationConsignee.description:
Information from the consignor to the consignee relating to the consignment. This information is not to commit the carrier.
CIM: 15
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - not allowed - not allowed

wagonGroupInfo.description:
Consignor information regarding the whole consignment. Comparable with the fiel WagonInfo, but for all wagons.
CIM: 21
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (With the agreement of the consignor.)

attachedDocuments.description:
Paper documents accompanying the transport
CIM: 9

items.description:
Listing of all the accompanying documents required for carriage which are attached to the consignment note. Additional information may be entered in a free text area for each code. The UN/DIFACT 1001 list of codes is to be used to code accompanying documents. 
CIM: 9

type.description:
Type code of attached document. The UN/DIFACT 1001 list of codes is to be used to code accompanying documents.
CIM: 9
CODE: UN/EDIFACT 1001, use code 916 as 'others' code
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor,or when documents attached are removed during transit.)

documentInformation.description:
Additional information regarding the attached document may be entered here.
CIM: 9
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor, or when documents attached are removed during transit.)

quantity.description: Number of copies of the current type is accompanying the transport.

documentTypeDescription.description:
Description of document type, when it is not in the UN/EDIFACT 1001 list included.
CIM: 9
RULE: IF (Type == 916) THEN mandatory ELSE not allowed
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor,or when documents attached are removed during transit.)

code.description:
Commercial specifications code
CIM: 13
CODE: CIM proposal
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

text.description:
Additional text of commercial specification
CIM: 13
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

carrierCode.description:
additional carrier code belonging to the given contract number
CIM: 13
RULE: IF (CommercialSpecification.Code == 5) THEN Allowed ELSE Not Permitted
CODE: UIC-Code
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

contractNumber.description:
additional contract number according to the given carrier code.
CIM: 13
RULE: IF (CommercialSpecification.Code == 5) THEN Allowed ELSE Not Permitted
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

prepaidCode.description:
Prepaidcode (given by the client)
CIM: 20
CODE: UIC-Code
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

incotermCode.description:
Incoterm (given by the client)
CIM: 20
CODE: INCOTERM (UIC leaflet 920-7)
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

prepaidcodeCarrier.description:
Prepaidcode (given by the railway)
CIM: 49
CODE: UIC-Code
READ: ---
WRITE: ---
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier

paidUpTo.description: Charges Paid Up To ... This information is being sent by the consignor in agreement with the contractual carrier so only one structure is needed for field 20 and 49. The carrier is only allowed to apply changes, when ordered by the consignor.

UICCountryCode.description:
Country Code
CIM: 20
CIM: 49
RULE: IF (PrepaidUpTo/Station/StationCode is present) THEN Mandatory ELSE Allowed
CODE: UIC country code
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

stationCode.description:
Station Code including Check-digit (Railway Station Code)
CIM: 20
CIM: 49
CODE: UIC-Code
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

stationName.description:
Station Name
CIM: 20
CIM: 49
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

UICCountryCode.description:
Country Code
CIM: 20
CIM: 49
CODE: UIC country code
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

pointCode.description:
Border crossing point code
CIM: 20
CIM: 49
CODE: UIC-Code
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

PointName.description:
Border crossing point name
CIM: 20
CIM: 49
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

code.description:
Additional charges code according CIT GLV-CIM appendix 3
CIM: 49
CODE: CIT GLV-CIM appendix 3
READ: ---
WRITE: ---
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier

description.description:
Additional charges description
CIM: 49
READ: ---
WRITE: ---
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier

tariff.description: Number of customer agreement or tariff

contractNumber.description:
Number of customer agreement.
CIM: 14
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

tariffNumber.description:
Number of the tariff.

READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.)

invoicingCarrierCode.description:
Sectional invoicing by
CIM: 19
CODE: UIC-Code
READ: ---
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders or on theinstruction of the consignor orconsignee.)

invoicedSection.description: Information about the section to be invoiced.

UICCountryCode.description:
Invoiced section specified by country
CIM: 19
CODE: UIC country code
READ: ---
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders or on theinstruction of the consignor orconsignee.)

carrierCode.description:

CODE: UIC-Code
READ: ---

declarationOfValue.description: Details of the value of the goods and the currency code when the value exceeds the limit given in CIM Article 30 section 2.

value.description:
Amount
CIM: 26
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders by the consignor.)

currencyCode.description:
Currency abbreviation (ISO-4217 alphanumeric)
CIM: 26
CODE: ISO-4217 alphanumeric
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders by the consignor.)

interestInDelivery.description: Details of the amount and currency code of a special interest in delivery.

amount.description:
Amount
CIM: 27
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders from the consignor.)

currencyCode.description:
Currency abbreviation (ISO-4217 alphanumeric)
CIM: 27
CODE: ISO-4217 alphanumeric
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the caseof subsequent orders from the consignor.)

cashOnDelivery.description: Details of the amount to be collected on delivery and the currency code.

amount.description:
Amount
CIM: 28
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders from the consignor.)

currencyCode.description:
Currency abbreviation (ISO-4217 alphanumeric)
CIM: 28
CODE: ISO-4217 alphanumeric
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders from the consignor.)

routing.description: Has to be present for transports using CIM. For national (transports without border crossing) this element can be omitted.

routeCode.description:
Route code (RIP)
CIM: 50
CODE:
READ:  - Consignor  - Consignee 
WRITE: ---
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier

routeText.description:
Route (in clear)
CIM: 50
READ:  - Consignor  - Consignee 
WRITE: ---
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier

diversion.description:
Where there have been circumstances preventing carriage, enter the reason in this element ('Diverted because of ...').
CIM: 50
READ:  - Consignor - Consignee 
WRITE: ---
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier

borderPointCode.description:

CODE: UIC-Code

carrierCode.description:
additional carrier who shall do the special treatment.

specialTreatmentInformation.description:
Additional comment to the SpecialTreatmentCode used.
CIM: 50
READ:  - Consignor  - Consignee
WRITE: ---

UICCountryCode.description:
Country Code
CIM: 50
CODE: UIC country code
READ:  - Consignor - Consignee

AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier

Country Code where the customs procedures are foreseen.

CODE: UIC country code
READ:  - Consignor - Consignee

Station code including Check-digit (Railway Station Code) in which the formalities required by the customs and other administrative authorities are to be undertaken.

CODE: UIC-Code
READ:  - Consignor - Consignee

AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier

STP.description:
Simplified transport procedure is used (VGVV).
CIM: 58
READ:  - Successive carrier - Consignor - Consignee

orderDestinationUICStationCode.description: UIC Code of station serving the delivery of the order.

UICCountryCodeType.description:
Code of the country of the station serving the delivery or acceptance point.
CIM: 12
CIM: 62
CODE: UIC country code
READ: IF (DeliveryPoint) THEN  - Consignee IF (AcceptancePoint) THEN  - Consignor  - Consignee
WRITE: IF (DeliveryPoint) THEN  - Consignor IF (AcceptancePoint) THEN  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Data provided by the forwarding carrier) 
AMEND: IF (DeliveryPoint) THEN  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Addition of code. Amendment only if the name and delivery point do not match, or in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

code.description:
Code of the delivery or acceptance point. If the code is missing it may be entered by the carrier.
CIM: 11
CIM: 17
CODE: National codification
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE: IF (DeliveryPointCode) THEN  - Consignor IF (AcceptancePointCode) THEN  - Consignor - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier 
AMEND: IF (DeliveryPointCode) THEN  - Contractual carrier - Subsequent carrier (Addition of code. Amendment only in case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

name.description:
Name of the delivery or acceptance point.
CIM: 10
CIM: 16
READ: IF (DeliveryPointName) THEN  - Consignee IF (AcceptancePointName) THEN  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND: IF (DeliveryPointName) THEN  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Amendment only in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

country.description:

WRITE: IF (DeliveryPoint) THEN  - Consignor IF (AcceptancePoint) THEN  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Data provided by the forwarding carrier) 
AMEND: IF (DeliveryPoint) THEN  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier (Addition of code. Amendment only if the name and delivery point do not match, or in the case of subsequent orders or on the instruction of the consignor or consignee.) ELSE none

name.description:

name.description:

RID.description:
The requirement (optional/mandatory) of the RID detail tags depend on the dangerous good and the regarding RID regulations.
CIM: 21
RULE: IF (PreviousLoadedGood is present) THEN RID information belongs to PreviousLoadedGood

law.description:
The law after which the RID data are declared.
CIM: 21
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

items.description:
All Danger Label of this dangerous good according to the RID chapter 3.2, table A, column 5, excepting the shunting labels Model 13 and 15.
CIM: 21
CODE: OTIF RID-Specification
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

technicalDescription.description:
The Technical Description is an approved chemical or biological name and has to be present if the dangerous good has assigned a special provision 274 according to RID chapter 3.2, table A, column 6.
CIM: 21
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

longTextDescription.description:
The official name of this dangerous good according to the RID chapter 3.2, table A, column 2 Mandatory, except it concerns a declaration of an empty packaging of the type "EMPTY PACKAGING", "EMPTY RECEPTACLE", "EMPTY RECEPTACLE <=1000L, "EMPTY IBC" or "EMPTY LARGE PACKAGING" (the values still have to be defined).
CIM: 21
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

additionalInformation.description:
Additional description i.e. additional provisions (5.4.1.2.2)
CIM: 21
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

weight.description:
The total mass of this dangerous good - for empty RID = 0.
CIM: 21
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

weightNettoExplosiveMass.description:
Special provision only necessary and allowed for Class 1 - the total net mass of explosive substance (RID 5.4.1.2.1).
CIM: 21
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

hazardNumber.description:
The Hazard Number of the dangerous good according to the RID chapter 3.2, table A, column 20. It's Mandatory, when a marking in accordance the RID chapter 5.3.2.1 is prescribed.
CIM: 21
CODE: OTIF RID-Specification
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

UNNumber.description:
The UNNumber of the dangerous good according to the RID chapter 3.2, table A, column 1. Mandatory, except it concerns a declaration of an empty packaging of the type "EMPTY PACKAGING", "EMPTY RECEPTACLE <=1000L", "EMPTY IBC" or "EMPTY LARGE PACKAGING" (the values still have to be defined).
CIM: 21
CODE: OTIF RID-Specification
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

class.description:
The Class of the dangerous good according to the RID chapter 3.2, table A, column 3a.
CIM: 21
CODE: OTIF RID-Specification (structure: xx.x)
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

classificationCode.description:
The Classification Code of the dangerous good according to the RID chapter 3.2, table A, column 3b. Mandatory for Class 1 - optional, but possibly for all the other classes.
CIM: 21
CODE: OTIF RID-Specification
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

packingGroup.description:
The Packing Group according to the RID chapter 3.2, table A, column 4. Possible values are "I", "II" or "III", otherwise the Packing Group have to be omitted. Mandatory, if it's foreseen in column 4, except it concerns a declaration of an empty packaging of the type "EMPTY PACKAGING", "EMPTY RECEPTACLE <=1000L", "EMPTY IBC" or "EMPTY LARGE PACKAGING" (the values still have to be defined). 
CIM: 21
CODE: OTIF RID-Specification
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

emptyPackingCode.description:
Code of empty packing as described in RID 5.4.1.1.6.2
CIM: 21
CODE: OTIF RID-Specification, element EMPTY has been added as 'dummy' until the code list has been finished and approved. 
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

natureOfPacking.description:
Nature of packing
CIM: 21
CODE: UN/ECE-Recommendation No. 21
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

numberOfPackages.description:

READ:  - Consignee

items.description:

CIM: 21
READ:  - Consignee

AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

NHMCode.description:
NHM code of the good
On the Expertsmeeting on 07.03.2012 it was decided to re-define this data element as optional and to add the following rule: if the group "Good" is used in the frame of the data element "UTI" or "Rola" and the attribute "LoadingStatus" of the related data element "UTIDetails" or "RolaDetails" = "empty", the data element "NHMCode" may not be present. In all other cases the data element "NHMCode" has to be provided. 

CIM: 21
CODE: UIC-Code
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

previousLoadedGood.description:
NHM code of the previous loaded good.
CUV: 21
RULE: IF (wagon loadingStatus = 'empty') then allowed ELSE prohibited

goodDescription.description:
Description of the good.
CIM: 21
RULE: IF (CIM) THEN Mandatory ELSE optional
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

additionalGoodInformation.description:

CIM: 21
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)

grossMass.description:
Gross mass [kg] of the good, incl. packaging.
CIM: 25
READ:  - Consignee 
WRITE:  - Consignor 
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier - Subsequent carrier (Addition of data. Amendment in the case of examination.)

HSCode.description:
HS-Code for sensible goods (appendix 44c of ccip) 10 digits are needed, if a good code was already assigned for 'Zollanmeldung'. In this case this good code has to be taken. These good codes may have more than 6 digits.
CIM: 21
CODE: Harmonized-System, RZZ of EG
READ:  - Consignee
WRITE:  - Consignor
AMEND:  - Contractual carrier  - Successive carrier  (With the agreement of the consignor)
